Special Powers
I'M NOT PRIME-WORTHY?!?! I'LL SHOW YOU PRIME WORTHY!!!: She-Hulk and adjacent friendly characters modify attack +1 when attacking a prime character. // She-Hulk and adjacent friendly characters take a maximum of 1 damage from prime characters.
FILE FOR A CHANGE OF VENUE: If She-Hulk isn't part of a themed team, the first time this game you wouldn't win roll for first player, you may roll again and add 1 to the result.
RELAX, IT'S JUST A HEROCLIX GAME!: Charge, Flurry, [Improved Movement: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.]
OBJECTION!: Willpower, Perplex.
